entities.name: Serious Black
entities.description: A man named 'Serious' Black mentioned by Fudge as a known Muggle killer. (Excerpt: 'Black's a known Muggle killer...')

entities.name: Fudge
entities.description: The Minister of Magic who visited the Prime Minister to inform him about the breakout at Azkaban and the potential threat posed by Serious Black. (Excerpt: 'Fudge had panted...')

entities.name: Azkaban
entities.description: A prison located in the middle of the North Sea, mentioned as being in uproar due to a breakout. (Excerpt: 'I've just come from Azkaban...')

entities.name: Hogwarts
entities.description: A school that sounds similar to Azkaban and is mentioned by Fudge as something he has heard of. (Excerpt: 'something that sounded like Hogwarts...')

entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: A boy who is mentioned by Fudge in the context of being associated with Serious Black and You-Know-Who. (Excerpt: 'a boy called Harry Potter...')

entities.name: You-Know-Who
entities.description: A person or entity that is mentioned by Fudge as someone Serious Black may be planning to rejoin. (Excerpt: 'but of course, you don’t even know who You-Know-Who is!')

entities.name: Dementors
entities.description: A group of entities that are in uproar at Azkaban due to a breakout. (Excerpt: 'the Dementors are in uproar...')

relationships.description: Fudge informed the Prime Minister about Serious Black's potential threat. (Excerpt: 'I had to come to you, Prime Minister...')
